titleStmt.title: A letter from the Assembly of Divines in England, and the commissioners of the Church of Scotland, written, and sent by order of the honorable House of Commons assembled in Parliament, to the Belgick, French, Helvetian, and other reformed churches. Translated into English, and now published with the severall inscriptions to those churches. By order of the said House.
Literae a Conventu Theologorum in Anglia et Ecclesiae Scoticanae delegatis. English

Translated into English, and now published with the severall inscriptions to those churches. By order of the said House.
Literae a Conventu Theologorum in Anglia et Ecclesiae Scoticanae delegatis. English
titleStmt.author: Westminster Assembly
Lauderdale, John Maitland, Duke of, 1616-1682.
Church of Scotland. General Assembly.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Cotes, for Ralph Smith, and are to bee sold at his shop, at the signe of the Bible in Cornhill, neere the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: An English translation of the Assembly's Literæ a Conventu Theologorum in Anglia et Ecclesiæ Scoticanæ delegatis.
Signed: Jo. Maitland etc., commissioners of the Church of Scotland.
The first leaf bears order to print dated 13 March 1643 [i.e. 1644].
In this edition, line 4 of title reads: Assembly of Divines.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
